posts.post_content:
Hello all,

I'm rather new to the vintage card circuit and am looking to pick up a low grade Matty card.  I've been a huge Matty fan since I read "Pitching in a Pinch" in HS.  I'd like a turn of the century card nothing past his playing days.  I'd perfer PSA or SCG in a 1,2 or even just an authentic.  I'm looking to spend around $200 so I know I can't be picky.  I just want one that has some visual appeal as it'll be to display and will never be sold.  

Sorry, it's a bit vague but it's been a goal of mine and I'd like to reach it.

Thanks,

Brian
Thanks, I'll look into those.  I'm leaning more towards a early T card, but I'm keeping my options open.

T206 white cap on left...$200 shipped!

pete ullman
[url]ullmandds@gmail.com[/url]
